Dialogue: Timmy: My-my BROTHER!! He was so strong… is he really… dead? This was outside my calculations.
Yes --> Timmy: W-W-W-Why are you looking at me like that!?
Timmy: Well… I guess it makes sense that you should suspect something…
Timmy: I was doing math equations with the ducks in the pond last night. They are surprisingly intelligent…
Peter: I… can’t believe this happened again.
Peter: I should have… done something.
Peter: Yes --> I don’t want to suspect anyone… There is no way it could have been one of us, right?
Peter: I guess I should still help you though. I was by the Hay Bales last night.
Lily: Death is a natural part of life. This was like totally bound to happen.
Yes --> Lily: Ugh I don’t know what happened and I have important things to do. Now leave me alone.
Markus: HOWDY YALL!! Remember, when you saddle up on horseback to strap your tootsies in. The old Betsy’s still have a kick in em.
Yes --> Markus: If you were wondering where little old me was last night don’t worry, I was handling the cattle in the barn.
